subject: Basketball
NCAA Basketball Tournament
lead_paragraph: The combination of guards Tyrese Rice and Sean Marshall along with the A.C.C. player of the year Jared Dudley was too much for Texas Tech as Boston College advanced to the second round.
snippet: The combination of guards Tyrese Rice and Sean Marshall along with the A.C.C. player of the year Jared Dudley was too much for Texas Tech as Boston College advanced to the second round.
